item.title: Clojure Files
item.description: (require '[clojure.java.io :as io]) ; returns java.io.File object (io/file "/tmp/foo") ; returns seq of java.io.File in a dir (file-seq (io/file "/tmp")) ; java.io.File class ; https://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/io/File.html (.isDirectory %) (.isFile %) (.getName %) (.getPath %) ; create dir (.mkdir (io/file "dir")) ; delete dir has files (doseq [f (reverse (file-seq (io/file dir)))] (io/delete-file f))
